name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edward HARDISON, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edward HARDISON, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Marilyn C. Zilli, First Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Marion E. MacIntyre, 1st. Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
433 A.2d 3
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Edward HARDISON, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 18, 1981.
Decided July 2, 1981.
Marilyn C. Zilli, First Asst. Public Defender, for appellant.
Marion E. MacIntyre, 1st. Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
